title: Confessions of a Transylvanian
description: Confessions of a Transylvanian is a one-of-a-kind, backstage look at the greatest cult movie phenomenon of all time—the live Rocky Horror Picture Show—told by those who lived it. Confessions is a moving snapshot of life in a Rocky Horror cast that captures the grit, language and teenage angst of a group of fishnet-clad performers as they explore a world where the only rule Don't dream it. Be it. So get ready to take that jump to the left and that step to the right...and do the time warp again.
author: Kevin Theis
